title: Dhevathayai Kanden Lyrics Kadhal Kondaen
stanzas:
dhevathayai kanden
kadhalil vizhundhen
en uyir udan kalandhu vittaal

nenjukkul nulaintdhal
moochinil nirainthaal
en mugavari maattri vaithaal

oru vannathu poochi
endhan vazhi thedi vanthathu
athan vannangal mattum
indru viralodu ullathu

theekkulle viral vaithaen
thani theevil kadai vaithaen
mannal veedu katti vaithaen

dhevathai dhevathai dhevathai dhevathai
aval oru dhevathai dhevathai
dhevathai dhevathai dhevathai

vizhi oramaai oru neer thuli
vazhiyuthe en kadhali
athan aalangal
nee unarnthal pothum
pothum pothum

azhiyamale oru niyabagam
azhai paayuthe enna kaaranam
arugamaiyil un vaasam veesinaal
suwaasam sooderidum

kadarkarai mele pookkum pookkal
koondhalai poi than serathe
ethanai kadhal ethanai aasai
thadam maaruthe
thadam maaruthe
adi boomi kanavu
udainthu poguthe

thozhiye oru nerathil
thozhile nee saigaiyil
aaviyaai manam paalai
pogum pogum

soliyaai ennai suzhattrinaal
soolnilai dhisai maattrinaai
kaanalaai un kadhal kanden
kannai kurudakkinaai

kaattrinil kizhiyum
ilai kalukkellam
kaattridam kobam kidaiyathu
unnidam kobam
ingu naan kondaal
engu naan povathu
ennaavathu en
vaazhvum thaazhvum
unnai servathu
